articles.author: Ethan Shanfeld
articles.title: One Direction’s Liam Payne Hospitalized With ‘Serious Kidney Infection,’ Postpones Tour - Variety
articles.description: Liam Payne has postponed his South American tour due to being hospitalized for a “serious kidney infection,” the former One Direction member announced on Instagram Friday morning. &#822…
articles.content:
Liam Payne has postponed his South American tour due to being hospitalized for a “serious kidney infection,” the former One Direction member announced on Instagram Friday morning.
